channel.title: Data sharing on HiCognition
channel.description: Recent content in Data sharing on HiCognition

item.title: Session
item.description: HiCognition sessions encapsulate a particular configuration of widgets inside all open widgets. Creating a session To save the current state of all your widget collections, click on Save Session in the top-right menu: This will open a dialogue, which allows you to name your current session: When you click submit, this will persist your session in the database. Restoring sessions After you create a session, you can restore your session by clicking on the My Session button in the top-right menu.
